text: Robert Mulligan (August 23, 1925 â€“ December 20, 2008) was an Academy Award- nominated American movie and television director. He directed movies such as To Kill a Mockingbird and The Man in the Moon. == Filmography == * The Man in the Moon (1991) * Clara's Heart (1988) * Kiss Me Goodbye (1982) * Bloodbrothers (1978) * Same Time, Next Year (1978) * The Nickel Ride (1974) * The Other (1972) * Summer of '42 (1971) * The Pursuit of Happiness (1971) * The Stalking Moon (1969) * Up the Down Staircase (1967) * Inside Daisy Clover (1965) * Baby the Rain Must Fall (1965) * Love with the Proper Stranger (1963) * To Kill a Mockingbird (1962) * The Spiral Road (1962) * Come September (1961) * The Great Impostor (1961) * The Rat Race (1960) * Fear Strikes Out (1957) Category:1925 births Category:2008 deaths Category:American movie directors Category:Entertainers from New York City
title: Robert Mulligan
